descriptions.about: I have extensive experience working with various frameworks and technologies in web development. I professionally master Nuxt 3 and Tailwind CSS, and bring my design ideas to life using Sketch.

descriptions.index: I'm a frontend developer from Moscow. I love Vue, clean code, and beautiful design.
